item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my personal blog. I intend to write and share my thoughts on technology, software engineering, and anything that comes to mind. Author I’m Xuebing (pronounced as shoe-bing). I am a Staff Engineer at Zendesk, where I build scalable fault-tolerant distributed systems. Currently, I work on high-throughput low-latency streaming platform using Scala, Apache Kafka, Kubernetes, and Amazon Web Services (AWS). Previously, I’ve worked at a finance software company and a fast-growing startup, where I built loan management software with complex workflows and Airbnb-like marketplace respectively.

item.title: Binary Search in Scala
item.description: Binary search is efficient in locating an element or insertion position in a sorted sequence. Many programming language implements binary search in their standard library. Scala is no exception.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
